## 🌍 Global Measles Analysis --- TidyTuesday 25-06-2025

This project investigates global measles outbreak data using the [TidyTuesday 2025-06-24 dataset](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/main/data/2025/2025-06-24). Using WHO provisional reports from 2015--2025, the analysis highlights vulnerable countries, under-reported outbreaks, and population-level immunisation challenges.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Key Features

-   🔥 **Seasonal Heatmap** of monthly outbreak patterns for top countries.
-   🫧 **Bubble Chart** showing vaccine coverage gaps for large populations
-   🕸️**Scatter Plot** to detect under-reporting by comparing incidence and totals
